menu_overview.question: show me the menu, what do you have, what can I order
menu_overview.answer: Here's our KFC menu: Chicken Buckets (6pc $15.99, 9pc $22.99, 12pc $28.99, 16pc $35.99), Burgers (Zinger $5.99, Double Down $7.99, Tower $8.99), Wraps (Classic $4.99, Spicy $5.49, Grilled $5.99), Sides (Fries, Coleslaw, Mashed Potatoes), and Beverages. What interests you?

chicken_buckets.question: chicken buckets, bucket prices, how much is a bucket
chicken_buckets.answer: Our chicken buckets: 6-piece for $15.99, 9-piece for $22.99 (most popular!), 12-piece for $28.99, and 16-piece Family Feast for $35.99. All include your choice of original or crispy chicken.

six_piece.question: 6 piece bucket, how much is 6 piece
six_piece.answer: The 6-piece bucket is $15.99. It serves 2-3 people and you can choose original or crispy chicken.

nine_piece.question: 9 piece bucket, how much is 9 piece
nine_piece.answer: The 9-piece bucket is $22.99. This is our most popular size and serves 3-4 people!

twelve_piece.question: 12 piece bucket, how much is 12 piece
twelve_piece.answer: The 12-piece bucket is $28.99. It serves 4-5 people. Would you like to add any sides?

family_feast.question: 16 piece, family feast, biggest bucket
family_feast.answer: Our Family Feast is a 16-piece bucket for $35.99. It includes 4 large sides, 4 biscuits, and a 1.5L drink. Perfect for families of 5-6 people!

burgers.question: burgers, what burgers, burger menu
burgers.answer: Our burgers: Zinger Burger $5.99 (crispy chicken, lettuce, mayo), Double Down $7.99 (no bun, double chicken!), Colonel's Burger $6.49, and Tower Burger $8.99 (our biggest with hash brown). All available as combos with fries and drink!

zinger.question: zinger burger, how much is zinger, zinger price
zinger.answer: The Zinger Burger is $5.99 alone, or $8.99 as a combo with fries and drink. It has a crispy chicken fillet, fresh lettuce, and mayo on a toasted bun!

double_down.question: double down, what is double down
double_down.answer: The Double Down replaces the bun with TWO chicken fillets! It has bacon, cheese, and sauce sandwiched between crispy chicken. It's $7.99 and very popular!

tower_burger.question: tower burger, biggest burger
tower_burger.answer: The Tower Burger is our largest at $8.99! It has a chicken fillet, hash brown, cheese, bacon, and special sauce. Super filling!

wraps.question: wraps, what wraps, twister
wraps.answer: We have three wraps: Classic Twister $4.99, Spicy Twister $5.49, and Grilled Twister $5.99. All include lettuce, tomato, and our special sauce!

sides.question: sides, what sides, side dishes
sides.answer: Our sides: Regular Fries $2.99, Large Fries $3.99, Coleslaw $2.49, Mashed Potatoes with gravy $2.99, Corn on the Cob $2.49, and Biscuits $1.99 each.

fries.question: fries, french fries, how much are fries
fries.answer: Fries are Regular $2.99 or Large $3.99. Hot, crispy, and delicious!

beverages.question: drinks, beverages, what drinks
beverages.answer: We have Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, Mountain Dew, Sierra Mist, and Lemonade. Small $1.99, Medium $2.49, Large $2.99. Bottled water is $1.49.

combos.question: combos, combo meals, meal deals
combos.answer: Our combo meals: Zinger Combo (burger + fries + drink) $8.99, 3-Piece Chicken Combo $9.99, and Wrap Combo $7.99. All combos save you at least $2!

prices.question: prices, how much, cost, expensive, cheap
prices.answer: Prices range from $1.99 (biscuits, small drinks) to $35.99 (Family Feast). Chicken pieces start at $2.49, burgers from $5.99, wraps from $4.99, sides from $1.99.

popular.question: most popular, best seller, favorite, recommend
popular.answer: Our most popular item is the 9-piece bucket at $22.99 - perfect for families! Second favorite is the Zinger Combo at $8.99. Can't go wrong with either!

deals.question: deals, specials, discounts, offers
deals.answer: Today's deals: Buy any bucket get 50% off large fries! Every Tuesday is $5 Zinger Burger day. Family Feast includes free 1.5L Pepsi!

vegetarian.question: vegetarian, veg options, no meat
vegetarian.answer: Vegetarian options: Veggie Zinger Burger $5.49, Veggie Twister Wrap $4.99, plus all our sides (fries, coleslaw, corn, mashed potatoes) are vegetarian!

hours.question: hours, opening hours, when open, timing
hours.answer: We're open daily 10 AM to 11 PM. Drive-thru stays open until midnight on weekends. Delivery available through our app during operating hours!
